metadata.title: Combat Veterans And Soldiers - Willing To Die T-Shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
Perfect shirt for to honor the sacrifices made by United States military veterans, soldiers, sailors in combat. Great armed forces vet gift.
Perfect for veterans, vietnam vet, heroes, soldiers and policemen. Show everyone how proud you are to be an American.
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: The ideal gift for veterans, gift for patriots, featuring American flag and the cross with a patriotic veteran stance. If you are a strong military or army troop soldier, you will love this tee.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "10 x 8 x 1 inches; 4.8 Ounces", "Department": "mens", "Date First Available": "October 13, 2017", "Manufacturer": "Combat Veteran Shirt"}
